mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.innercode, t.org_id, t.dept_id, t.establishdate, t.tenantid, t.sysid, t.enable, t.creator, t.creationtime, t.ts, t.dr FROM bd_position t WHERE 1=1
and t.code = #{condition.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.id as "id", t.code as "code", t.name as "name", t.innercode as "innercode", t.org_id as "org_id", tn.code as "orgCode", t.dept_id as "dept_id", td.code as "deptCode", t.establishdate as "establishdate", t.tenantid as "tenantid", t.sysid as "sysid", t.enable as "enable", t.creator as "creator", t.creationtime as "creationtime", t.ts as "ts", t.dr as "dr" FROM bd_position t INNER JOIN org_department td ON t.dept_id=td.id INNER JOIN org_organization tn ON t.org_id=tn.id WHERE 1=1
and t.code = #{condition.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bd_position( id, code, name, innercode, org_id, dept_id, jobtype_id, maxrank_id, minrank_id, suporior, maxage, minage, professional, degree, reqedu, reqsex, reqworktime, reqexp, reqcert, duties, memo, loc_id, bu_id, jobgrade_id, establishdate, parentid, objid, businessid, synchts, enable, creator, creationtime, modifier, modifiedtime, tenantid, sysid, ts, dr ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innercode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobtype_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxrank_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minrank_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suporior, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxage, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minage, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{professional, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqedu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqsex, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reqworktime, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reqexp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqcert, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duties, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loc_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bu_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobgrade_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{establishdate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{parentid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{synchts, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enable, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tenantid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bd_position SET code= #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name= #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, innercode= #{innercode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id= #{org_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id= #{dept_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobtype_id= #{jobtype_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maxrank_id= #{maxrank_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, minrank_id= #{minrank_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suporior= #{suporior, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maxage= #{maxage, jdbcType=INTEGER}, minage= #{minage, jdbcType=INTEGER}, professional= #{professional, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree= #{degree, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reqedu= #{reqedu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reqsex= #{reqsex, jdbcType=INTEGER}, reqworktime= #{reqworktime, jdbcType=INTEGER}, reqexp= #{reqexp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reqcert= #{reqcert, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duties= #{duties, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo= #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loc_id= #{loc_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bu_id= #{bu_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobgrade_id= #{jobgrade_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, establishdate= #{establishdate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, parentid= #{parentid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, objid= #{objid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessid= #{businessid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, synchts= #{synchts, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enable= #{enable, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator= #{creator, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creationtime= #{creationtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier= #{modifier, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifiedtime= #{modifiedtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tenantid= #{tenantid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysid= #{sysid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ts= #{newTs, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr= #{dr, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ts = #{ts, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
